name: DriveForever
description:
Drive Forever

We have all seen the mobile game ads that play absolutely NOTHING like the actual game.
Well I didn't make a mobile game, however it would fit perfectly in one of those ads.

Screenshot of the beginning of the game is on the right.

Gameplay
An endless driving game, you pass through math fields that alter your level, you need to pass through the one that increases your level the most, between the fields is an enemy with a random and realistic level, the higher you come the more your mistakes matter. If your level is below him you lose, you also lose if you touch the railing or the big X between the math fields. All the while around you are explosions and war planes flying above.
